Parameters: Cell type and species (primary human airway epithelial cells, mouse tracheal epithelial cells); culture conditions; days at ALI; p73 genotype or knockdown efficiency; cell model (MucilAir™); donor information and passage number; differentiation medium; substrate type; exposure regimen (dose, duration, frequency - 28 days); fixation and staining protocols; culture model type; RNA extraction method; sequencing platform and depth

p73 manipulation (knockout, siRNA knockdown); heated tobacco aerosol; cigarette smoke; e-cigarette aerosol (28 days repeated exposure); immunohistochemistry antibodies (anti-FoxJ1); co-staining with Muc5AC for goblet cells; acetylated α-tubulin for cilia; ChIP-seq for p73 binding; qRT-PCR primers and normalization genes; RNA-seq; imaging parameters

FoxJ1 mRNA levels (fold change, log2 fold change); FoxJ1 protein levels; Percentage of FoxJ1+ cells; FoxJ1 staining intensity; Cilia number and length correlation; p73 binding to FoxJ1 promoter; Ratio of ciliated cells (FoxJ1+) to goblet cells (Muc5AC+); Co-localization of FoxJ1 with ciliated cell markers; Differential expression of ciliated cell gene network; Enrichment scores for ciliogenesis pathways; Validation by qRT-PCR; Changes in ciliated cell population over exposure period; Correlation with functional endpoints (cilia beat frequency)
